content: Eric, what makes you believe that Thunderbird is corrrupted? Re-installing Thunderbird does not usually fix problems. If you describe your problems, people here may be able to help more.

content: The email provider's server is doing that. It's not unusual for that to happen when sending messages to many people at once or multiple messages at the same time, but for that to happen with only three seems too harsh. Make a complaint with their customer support.
creator: siffemoz

content:
Hi Joe,

What does the error message say?

When you set up the account, were your user name and password accepted?

Where and how did you block Thunderbird from accessing your contacts? Contacts where? In iCloud?

Please report your incoming and outgoing server settings. Incoming server settings are in account settings > server settings. Outgoing server settings are in account settings > click on account name > edit SMTP server.

We will need this information for each server:

server name port connection security method authentication method username: just report if whether or not you are using your full e-mail address
creator: mozilla98

content: In this section of the forum we speak Italian. For english support -> https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird/form

creator: mozilla98

content: I presume an IMAP account, as POP only retrieves from inbox. If there are messages in a folder other than the inbox, highlight the folder, rightclick, select properties, and tick to check this folder when retrieving messages. If I misunderstood your issue, please clarify. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: the profile is at appdata\roaming, not appdata\local Try again
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks: right, there are profiles in both locations, it seems the Roaming one is the correct one. Deleting this successfully removes the orginal POP3 account; I have since discovered that deleting Google cookies forces a a new password reentry, so that takes care of that, but it's still not authenticating. For the record I can still access the Gmail account via Outlook and web. I have checked the incoming and outgoing server settings in Account hub and they seem correct, also OAuth2 is selected
creator: davidhealer4

content:
Hi Jesper,

The error was trying to re-use the previous account and just changing some settings. One has to add the new account, transfer messages from the old account either to local folders or the new account, and then disable or delete the old account.

The new account seems to be an IMAP account. Is it? IMAP synchronizes folders with the server. When you had your inbox and other folders access the new account, those folders were synchronized with the new account.

But I do not understand why you can find messages from the old account by searching for them or why the names of all the folders are preserved in the folderTree.json file. So my diagnosis could be wrong.

I believe that you have two options:

  1. Re-connect to the old account if you still can, and start this process over.
  2. Restore from a back-up.

Maybe a third option: if your old account was a POP account, I understand that those messages are still on your local drive. Was it a POP account?
creator: mozilla98

content:
Poškozený index složky (NEJČASTĚJŠÍ PŘÍČINA). Thunderbird má zprávy fyzicky stažené, ale index složky je rozbitý.

Postup (bezpečný – o maily nepřijdete): Pravým tlačítkem klikněte na složku Doručená pošta (Inbox) u účtu Atlas Zvolte Vlastnosti Klikněte na Opravit složku Potvrďte a vyčkejte (může trvat i několik minut) Restartujte Thunderbird

Ve většině případů se zprávy okamžitě objeví.
creator: Ansamb

content: Bohužel, nepomohlo. Při uvedeném postupu se ukazuje počet zpráv 0, a nic se neopraví. Atlas účet vůbec nefunguje. Když z něj odešlu zprávu na jiný email, jako odeslaná se neukáže, avšak doručena je. To jsem tedy blázen...
creator: krizova.gabriela

content:
Je zapnutý filtr / skryté zprávy. Někdy je aktivní filtr, který způsobí, že se zdá, že žádné zprávy nejsou.

Zkontrolujte: Nahoře nad seznamem zpráv: zda není aktivní Rychlý filtr (ikona trychtýře) klikněte na „Zobrazit vše“ Menu Zobrazit → Zprávy nastavte Vše
creator: Ansamb

content: Je taky možné, že antivirus blokuje poštovní databázi.
creator: Ansamb

content:
Je mi moc líto, ale "zobrazit vše" - píše žádné zprávy, antivirus Eset jsem vypnula a taky to nepomohlo. Blbé je, že v archivovaných zprávách mám některé licence....

Přitom notifikace došlých zpráv ukazuje, že přišel nový mail, ale zobrazit se nedá
creator: krizova.gabriela

content:
Asi je poškozená složka Odeslané

Pravým tlačítkem na Odeslané Vlastnosti Opravit složku Restart Thunderbirdu
creator: Ansamb

content: The IP address brings up a webpage with information explicitly for your problem. Often there is a 'more' link on the page for specific guidance from your email provider They are abdicating their responsibility here. Thunderbird is only the messenger, presenting that message to you. However, if you post back the complete URL, including the IP numbers, someone here may be able to read the page and see what it says. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content:
Kedves Gábor!

Konkrétan ugyanazt a funkcionalitást nem tudja az androidos alkalmazás, de a beérkezett üzeneteket tudod egyesített módon kezelni.

A Beállítások -> Általános beállítások -> Megjelenés oldalon, a Fióklista szakaszban kapcsold be az Egységes beérkezett üzenetek megjelenítése lehetőséget. Ezután ez is megjelenik a fióklistában. Lásd a mellékelt képeket.

Üdv, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs
